template: a car trip of {value} miles 🚗
source: EPA, 'Greenhouse Gas Equivalencies Calculator'. Based on average U.S. passenger vehicle emissions per mile.

template: {value} hours of streaming video 📺
source: The Shift Project, a think tank on energy transition. Based on energy consumption of streaming video.

template: {value} showers saved 🚿
source: The Water Footprint Network. Based on average energy to heat water for a single shower.

template: {value} trees saved from being cut down 🌳
source: U.S. Forest Service. Based on carbon sequestration of an average tree over its lifetime.

template: keeping a light bulb on for {value} hours 💡
source: U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA). Based on average incandescent bulb usage.

template: {value} smartphone charges 📱
source: University of Cambridge, based on average smartphone battery capacity.

template: {value} disposable plastic bottles 💧
source: National Geographic. Based on emissions from plastic production and disposal.

template: a load of laundry for {value} people 🧺
source: EPA. Based on average energy and water use for a standard washing machine.

template: heating your home for {value} minutes 🔥
source: U.S. Department of Energy. Based on average natural gas heating.

template: a trip on a bus for {value} miles 🚌
source: EPA. Based on average bus emissions per passenger mile.

template: the energy to make {value} cups of coffee ☕
source: The Carbon Trust. Based on the full lifecycle of a cup of coffee.

template: the energy to toast {value} slices of bread 🍞
source: Academic research on food production life cycles.

template: {value} miles traveled by a bike 🚲
source: Calculated based on zero direct carbon emissions.

template: {value} minutes of a gaming console 🎮
source: Based on average console power consumption.

template: {value} hours of an energy-saving light bulb 💡
source: U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA). Based on LED bulb usage.

template: a pizza delivered for {value} miles 🍕
source: Based on average delivery vehicle emissions.

template: the water to grow {value} tomatoes 🍅
source: Water Footprint Network.

template: the power for {value} loads of laundry on cold 🧺
source: U.S. Department of Energy. Based on energy savings from washing on cold.

template: a movie night with a TV on for {value} hours 🍿
source: Based on average TV power consumption.

template: a single flight of stairs in a skyscraper {value} times 🏙️
source: Based on elevator energy consumption.

template: {value} hours of a laptop running 💻
source: Based on average laptop power consumption.

template: the production of {value} bags of potato chips 🥔
source: Based on agricultural and processing emissions.

template: a single banana's carbon footprint 🍌
source: Carbon Trust. Based on full lifecycle of a banana.

template: the carbon footprint of {value} avocados 🥑
source: Based on agricultural and transportation emissions.

template: a single cheeseburger 🍔
source: Based on research from the University of Michigan and the UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).

template: the emissions of a car idling for {value} minutes 🚗
source: EPA, 'Idling Reduction.' Based on a standard passenger vehicle.

template: the power for a fridge for {value} days 🧊
source: U.S. Department of Energy. Based on average refrigerator power consumption.

template: a round-trip commute by train for {value} miles 🚆
source: EPA. Based on average train emissions per passenger mile.

template: the energy to run a dishwasher for {value} cycles 🍽️
source: Based on average dishwasher energy and water consumption.

template: the emissions of a dog walking for {value} miles 🐕
source: Based on zero direct carbon emissions.

template: the emissions of a cat purring for {value} hours 🐱
source: Based on the minimal energy expenditure of a cat.

template: the emissions of a small coffee machine for {value} minutes ☕
source: Based on average coffee machine power consumption.

template: a round-trip flight for {value} miles ✈️
source: Based on average passenger emissions per mile.

template: {value} miles of a snail's trail 🐌
source: Based on the minimal energy expenditure of a snail.

template: {value} pounds of beef production 🥩
source: Based on research from the UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).

template: {value} liters of milk production 🥛
source: Based on research from the UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).

template: the carbon footprint of {value} apples 🍎
source: Based on research from the University of Oxford.

source: Based on research from the UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).

source: Based on research on methane emissions from livestock.

source: Based on emissions from paper manufacturing.
